item.title: DIY Face Masks
item.description: In light of COVID-19 and the resulting changes to public life I decided to take up a needle and sew some face masks! It’s actually fun to do and I wouldn’t have thought that I could actually do it! I got the layout from Nina (German blog post), who in turn got it from Jess Dang’s Video on YouTube (English video). Jess' masks look way better and cleaner than mine, but for my first few tries I’m incredibly happy with how they turned out.
